using System;
using System.Collections.Generic;
using System.Linq;
using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AbstractClass.Input
{
	public partial interface ITestInteraface
	{
		ValueTask ReadAsync();

		ValueTask<bool> WriteAsync(string content);
	}


	public abstract partial class AbstractTest : ITestInteraface
	{
		public virtual ValueTask ReadAsync()
		{
			return default(ValueTask);
		}

		public abstract ValueTask<bool> WriteAsync(string content);
	}

	public partial class TestCase : AbstractTest
	{
		public override ValueTask ReadAsync()
		{
			return default(ValueTask);
		}

		public override ValueTask<bool> WriteAsync(string content)
		{
			try
			{
				return new ValueTask<bool>(SimpleFile.Write(content));
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return new ValueTask<bool>(Task.FromException<bool>(ex));
			}
		}
	}
}
